title: Archimedes
alt: Give a man a fish, or he will destroy the only existing vial of antidote.
transcript:
[Cueball is standing normally.]
Cueball: In the words of Archimedes,[Cueball extends his left arm slightly.]
Cueball: Give me a long enough lever and a place to rest it[Cueball is now holding a gun in his right hand.]
Cueball: Or I will kill one hostage every hour.
